description: The Maxell 665308 500 MB GENpro External Hard Drive is a quick and easy way to backup the entirety of your computer’s contents with no stress. Just plug it in to your USB port and the GENpro goes to work protecting your PC. With pre-installed Maxell software, there’s no installation or other setup for continuous and automatic PC backup or everything including applications, settings and operating system preferences. You can set it to automatically backup your files or just drag and drop specific files you want. And it feature’s Neverfull technology which automatically grooms off old data first, so everything on your computer gets backed up and you never have to worry about your drive filling up.
title: Maxell 500 GB GENpro 2.5-Inch External Hard Drive 665208 (Black)
